name: @semiont/react-ui

scripts.build: npm run lint:css && npm run typecheck && tsup
scripts.test:components:misc: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vitest run src/components/error-states src/components/loading-states src/components/modals src/components/annotation src/components/Button src/components/resource/__tests__ src/components/__tests__

scripts.test:components:other: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vitest run src/components/annotation src/components/Button src/components/resource/__tests__ src/components/__tests__
scripts.test:other: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 vitest run src/contexts src/hooks src/lib src/assets
